full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 499-2 Filed 11/23/21 Page 128 of 159127 LBAGmax4 Rocchio - Cross of social science research. Because dropout rate refers to something else. This would be a response rate. Q. So we have a response rate that's a third less than was asked; right? A. Yes. Q. And then I want to go to the Page 11 of this study that you're relying on here, which is the appendix. Do you see that? A. I do. Q. Now, this is the interview guide that was given to these 22 unidentified professionals to guide the interview of the subjects here; correct? A. No. I believe that it was the professionals, the experts who were interviewed. So I believe that the -- these are the questions that were asked of the experts -- A. -- in their interviews. Q. Right. A. That's right. You know what a leading question is; right? A. As it's used, yes. Q. That was just a leading question; right? A. Yes. Q. So let's look at question seven here -- and these are nine questions that were given out as part of this study to ask for the data that was used for this study; right? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00007996

text_blocks.content: of social science research. Because dropout rate refers to something else. This would be a response rate. Q. So we have a response rate that's a third less than was asked; right? A. Yes. Q. And then I want to go to the Page 11 of this study that you're relying on here, which is the appendix. Do you see that? A. I do. Q. Now, this is the interview guide that was given to these 22 unidentified professionals to guide the interview of the subjects here; correct? A. No. I believe that it was the professionals, the experts who were interviewed. So I believe that the -- these are the questions that were asked of the experts -- A. -- in their interviews. Q. Right. A. That's right. You know what a leading question is; right? A. As it's used, yes. Q. That was just a leading question; right? A. Yes. Q. So let's look at question seven here -- and these are nine questions that were given out as part of this study to ask for the data that was used for this study; right?

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with a clear structure of questions and answers. The footer contains the name and contact information of the reporting company and a reference number.
